text: Laurie Jill "Lar" Park Lincoln (née Park; born May 12, 1961 — April 22, 2025) is an American actress. She appeared in House II: The Second Story, Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, and one episode of Freddy's Nightmares. She starred in Knots Landing. She was born in Dallas, Texas. Park Lincoln was married to Michael Martin Lincoln on December 5, 1981, and remained married until his death on December 4, 1995. She had two children and was living near Dallas, Texas. She had been battling breast cancer since 2008, and by 2012, had gone through numerous surgeries. Park Lincoln died from breast cancer on April 22, 2025, at the age of 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:20th-century American actors Category:21st-century American actors Category:American stage actors Category:Cancer deaths in Texas
title: Lar Park Lincoln
